Question: When you were a student, and teachers assigned group projects, what was your  reaction?

PollOptions.OptionText: Just great. Another project where I have to do all the work.
Please, don’t pair me up with people I don’t like.
Nobody do anything! I will do all the work. Just don’t touch anything.

Question: How comfortable are you working with your team in an Agile environment?

PollOptions.OptionText: Very comfortable and currently working in an Agile environment
Comfortable with the concept but not currently working in an Agile environment
Understand the concept but not comfortable, yet
Don't know much about Agile, yet
